Package com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.relocation

Class JarRelocatorTask

java.lang.Object
com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.relocation.JarRelocatorTask
final class JarRelocatorTask
extends java.lang.Object
A task that copies jar entries from a jar input to a jar output, applying the relocations defined by a RelocatingRemapper.
